column1: The Goblin Scribe is miniature Orcs#Orcs and Goblins played by Kiran Shah (via motion-capture) who worked as a scribe and a messenger for the Great Goblin in The Hobbit: An Unexpected Journey. He records events in Goblin-town. He is a tiny goblin with malformed legs
column2: and uses his long fingernail to write with on parchment. Because he cannot walk
column3: he gets around on a pulley with a seat attached to it.

column1: The Goblin King gives him orders to send a message to Azog that they have captured Thorin.
According to members of the film crew
column2: the Goblin Scribe is the offspring of the Great Goblin
column3: but he isnt given any proper recognition because of his diminutive stature.
